"Oh, you Guards!" said Rost6v. "I say, send for some wine." 
Boris made a grimace. 
"If you really want it," said he. 
He went to his bed, drew a purse from un- der the clean pillow, and sent for wine. 
"Yes, and I have some money and a letter to give you," he added. 
Rost6v took the letter and, throwing the money on the sofa, put both arms on the table and began to read. After reading a few lines, h
